Title: The First Glass Beach Album
Description: Will we ever leave our bedrooms in this bedroom community?

Title: Plastic Death
Description: Very slow and mellow. I enjoy how the vinyl glows in the dark

Title: Alchemist Rats Beg Bashful Remixes
Description: Some of the better songs of Plastic Death and the First Glass Beach Album, but a little bit more fun. If those albums are pizza, this is pineapple pizza.

Title: MG Ultra
Description: I dont like punk rock music

Title: Î£
Description: I just really like the vibe of these songs. Good to bop your head along to

Title: Remember That You Will Die
Description: Really nice instramentals, very smooth. I also like ABC for its fun vocals. Feels like a smooth wood grain.

Title: French Exit
Description: Some of the best background music that I can find. Its just a vibe, like rain on a window mounted AC unit.

Title: Fever Dream
Description: Gay Gay Gay Homosexual Gay. Also just a smidge transgender and its all the more fun for it.

Title: Hawaii Part: II
Description: Something gay IDK this is a lot
